code: import React from'react';import postlist from'./posts.json';import Markdown from'markdown-to-jsx';import{makeStyles}from'@material-ui/styles';import{Button,Card,CardContent}from'@material-ui/core';import{ArrowBack}from'@material-ui/icons';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var SinglePost=function SinglePost(props){var useStyles=makeStyles({container:{padding:"0",margin:"0"},buttonCard:{marginLeft:"10px",marginTop:"10px",size:"small",borderRadius:"20px",backgroundColor:"#6495ed"},sectionTop:{display:"flex",flexDirection:"row",padding:"0"},sectionMain:{padding:"0",margin:"-10px"}});var classes=useStyles();var fetchedPost={};postlist.forEach(function(post,i){var url=window.location.pathname;var urlsplit=url.split("/");var validId=parseInt(urlsplit[2]);if(validId===post.id){fetchedPost.title=post.title?post.title:"No title given";fetchedPost.date=post.date?post.date:"No date given";fetchedPost.author=post.author?post.author:"No author given";fetchedPost.description=post.description?post.description:"No description given";fetchedPost.content=post.content?post.content:"No content given";}});console.log(fetchedPost);var postpage=window.location.href.split("/");var dirpage="";for(var i=0;i<postpage.length-1;i++){dirpage+=postpage[i]+"/";}console.log(dirpage);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CardContent,{className:classes.sectionTop,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{onClick:function onClick(event){return dirpage;},className:classes.buttonCard,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ArrowBack,{})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(CardContent,{className:classes.sectionMain,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Markdown,{children:fetchedPost.content}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{})]})]})});};export{SinglePost};
